data.title: Camp Rock DVD
data.meta_description: This summer is gonna Rock! Get ready to sing and dance like never before with the electrifying Disney Channel Original Movie Camp Rock, starring Demi Lovato & the Jonas Brothers; Joe Jonas, Kevin Jonas & Nick Jonas.  When Mitchie gets a chance to attend Camp Rock, her life takes an unpredictable twist, and she learns just how important it is to be true to yourself.
data.text:
Starring: Demi Lovato, Joe Jonas, Kevin Jonas, Nick Jonas, Meaghan Jette Martin, Maria Canals-Barrera, Alyson Stoner, Julie Brown, Daniel Fathers

Directors: Matthew Diamond

Producers: Kevin Lafferty, Alan Sacks

Genre: Family

Rated: G

Running Time: 95 minutes

This summer is gonna Rock! Get ready to sing and dance like never before with the electrifying Disney Channel Original Movie Camp Rock! Disney's exclusive DVD explodes with "Too Cool" special features, including an exclusive extended ending and "How To Be A Rock Star," a sensational series full of tips and secrets from the Camp Rock cast to help make your real-life rock star dream come true!

When Mitchie gets a chance to attend Camp Rock, her life takes an unpredictable twist, and she learns just how important it is to be true to yourself.

Join the top-selling Jonas Brothers and the hottest cast of performers at the coolest summer camp anywhere! Experience Camp Rock in a whole new way in this Extended Rock Star Edition DVD, packed with hit music, hip dance moves, and special features that will have you singing, dancing and rocking over and over again.

Special Features

* Music Videos: "Start The Party", "We Rock"

* Sing Along With The Movie

* Camp Rock Karaoke

* Backstage Disney

* How To Be A Rock Star!

* Jonas Brothers: Real Life Rock Stars

* Introducing Demi Lovato

* Camp Memories

* "Hasta La Vista": From Rehearsals To Final Jam

* "Too Cool": Setting The Scene

The smash-hit Disney Channel Original Movie, Camp Rock, stars teen idols, The Jonas Brothers and talented new-comer Demi Lovato. Packed with amazing bonus features, Camp Rock on Disney DVD contains an exclusive, never-before-seen ending that takes place once camp is over- watch the future rock stars record their very-won song at the end of camp! Camp Rock on DVD is not to be missed!

Camp Rock follows Mitchie Torres (Demi Lovato) who desperately dreams of attending Camp Rock to pursure her dreams of becoming a singer. All her dreams come true when he mum lands a job as the camp chef and Mitchie is allowed to come along for the ride. As long as Mitchie lends a hand in the kitchen, she is free to rock on at camp with the rest of the kids!

At the camp as an instructor Shane Grey (Joe Jonas), a teen pop-star who has been sent to Camp Rock by his band mates (Nick and Kevin Jonas) as punishment for becoming a diva. He overhears Mitchie singing, but doesn't see her face, so he sets out to find the girl with the beautiful voice.

Along the way, Mitchie and her rock star friends learn to live, eat, sleep and breath music. Most importantly, Mitchie and her fellow campers discover what it means to be true to yourself.

The Camp Rock cast deliver amazing song and dance numbers as part of their camp routines and households everywhere will be rocking along with the campers, tapping to the beat and dancing in their seats!

The all-new Camp Rock Disney DVD comes with amazing bonus features including music videos, karaoke and sing-along modes. You can also go backstage and learn how to be a rock star, view behind-the-scenes clips of the Jonas Brothers, Demi Lovato, cast dance rehearsal and much more!

See what happens after camp with an exclusive, never-before-seen extended ending. Camp Rock is over and our future rock stars, including Mitchie, Joe and the boys, record their very own song.

Packed with the hottest new talent and music and the hippest new dance moves, Camp Rock is not to be missed! Join in the summer fun of Camp Rock, the absolute must-have Disney DVD this Christmas.

Review: As High School Musical comes to it's finale, it's good to know that there is more rocking Disney entertainment to look forward to. Fantastic concept, great music and all the makings of another Disney phenomenon.

Camp Rock on Disney DVD

Price: $36.95
